Description:
Gorgeous 3 bedroom home.
Boasting character and charm this incredibly neat three bedroom home situated on a generous 613m2 (approx.) allotment could be exactly what you've been searching for! Currently occupied by fantastic tenants till late 2019 providing investors an amazing opportunity to secure this place in the growing suburb of Corio.
Complete with an attractive facade, that features a veranda, white trim and bay window, the home possesses a light filled interior through out with a functional floorplan. At the heart of the home, a spacious main living room opens up to the practical kitchen and adjoining meals area. All three bedrooms can be found off the main hall close to the central bathroom and separate W/C. Enjoy entertaining outside in the extensive undercover alfresco overlooking the grassed rear yard complete with SLUG.
Located just minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, parks & reserves. Easy access to public transport with bus stops just around the corner and the Princes Highway close by means just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's waterfront and CBD.
Immaculately presented and well cared for this charming home offers an amazing amount of potential for its new owners.
** PLEASE NOTE: Photos used for advertising are from the previous sale of the home. Please call to inspect the property in person and its current condition.
Insights: 28 Donax Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Living in Sought After Rose Park Estate
Situated in the Rose Park Estate - Corio's most sought after location is this well-presented family home. Within minutes from the Geelong Ring Rd & the Princes Hwy for Melbourne/Surf Coast commuting, this property will not last long on the market. Featuring 3 good-sized bedrooms, all with built in robes, ensuite and walk-in-robe to main, central bathroom and laundry & an open plan kitchen/dining/living area. Ducted heating throughout plus s/system cooling. Currently tenanted until July 2019 makes this a fantastic investment opportunity or first home, don't miss out!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Brand new stunning home.
Brand new and never lived in, this stunning residence deserves your attention. Boasting striking features throughout and a convenient well designed floor plan, this property is just waiting for the right purchaser to make this their new home or investment.
Providing an attractive facade, this inviting household comprises of 3 generous bedrooms (2 with BIRs) with the master suite containing WIR and private ensuite. Centrally located, the gleaming bathroom offers large shower and a deep set bathtub while adjacent sits a great sized laundry with ample storage space.
The stylish kitchen has been tastefully finished with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops, 900mm cook top, dishwasher and walk in pantry and overlooks the extensive living and dining area which opens through, via glass stacking doors, to the low maintenance backyard which provides seamless inside/outside entertaining.
Additional features include:
- S/S air-conditioning & heating
- Ducted heating throughout
- Remote single garage with internal access
- Garden shed
Located with easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and most major amenities such as schools for all ages, reserves, sporting facilities and the Corio shopping complex just a 2 minute drive away.
This property is sure to leave a lasting impression, so if you're in the market for an exquisite home, don't wait - organise your inspection today!
Photo ID Required
Insights: 146B Matthews Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"VENDOR SAYS 'SELL'"
If you are looking for your next project, then look no further than this extremely affordable 2/3 bedroom family home. Situated on a large 596sqm block (approx.) this property lends itself to future re-development (STCA). With 2 bedrooms, originally 3 bedrooms, a large lounge room, central kitchen and bathroom, and an oversized back yard which is a blank canvas.
Take advantage of the future possibilities this property presents and grab yourself a large parcel of land within walking distance to Corio Central shopping centre, schools, medical facilities & public transport at your doorstep.
-Potential to Subdivide (STCA)
-2 or 3 Bedroom Home
-Central Kitchen/Dining Area
-Close Proximity to All Amenities
-Renovators Delight

Description:
A Home that says Welcome
There’s far more than meets the eye with this charming brick home, offering extensive accommodation and private living for growing families.
Exceptionally well built, this extended and renovated home allows for truly comfortable and modern living, and has been meticulously cared for by the current owners, and is now ready for a new family to call it their own.
Positioned in a quiet street with lovely neighbours, the home itself comprises;
• Four spacious bedrooms; master with ensuite
• Brand-new kitchen with quality appliances, ample bench space and WIP
• 2 x separate living spaces, ideal for parent’s and kid’s retreats
• Large, low maintenance front and rear yards
• Paved outdoor courtyard ideal for entertaining
• Single garage plus storage sheds and an abundance of off-street parking for boats/caravans/vehicles
• Extras include: tinted windows, 3 x outdoor power-points, USB wall connections, 4 x electric awnings, split-system heating/cooling, gas wall heater and separate a/c unit, gas clothes dryer
• Land size: 654m2 approx
Loddon Street is conveniently located in walking distance to all your major amenities including the Corio Village Shopping Centre, schools, medical facilities, public transport and nearby ring-road access.
Insights: 4 Loddon Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Opportunity beckons
Whether you're a first home owner, downsizing or an investor looking for a great rental property, this two-bedroom, one-bathroom unit has a lot to offer. Immaculately presented and low-maintenance in its design and offering open-plan living plus a convenient location, this neat-and-tidy unit is a must-see. The light-filled living and dining space is complete with gas heating for year-round comfort. A good-size kitchen overlooks the living room and offers ample bench and storage space plus gas cooking and breakfast bar. The master bedroom features a built-in robe while a secure, private paved courtyard is ideal for barbequing with friends and family. A bathroom with a shower and separate laundry with outdoor access complete the internal floorplan. Security screens add extra peace-of-mind and a separate single carport with additional storage adds convenience. This great unit is within walking distance of public transport and is close to schools. Local shopping is nearby along with Corio train station and the Geelong Ring Road.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Spacious and private, made for living
Immaculately presented and offering a spacious floorplan with light filled living, this two-bedroom, low-maintenance home is ideally suited to first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike. A large open-plan kitchen, living and dining space that spills out to a large private outdoor area and patio make it an ideal setting to relax and entertain. The kitchen is modern and sleek with gas cooking, a dishwasher, a large island bench and ample storage. The oversized master and second bedroom feature built-in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom with a bath, separate shower and a separate toilet. Extra features include ducted heating and split system air-conditioning, plus a single garage with internal access. Conveniently located close to a range of amenities including local shops, schools, Corio Village and public trasnport and with easy access to the Ring Road, you will be able to move in and enjoy all this property has to offer.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Modern family home
Whether you're dreaming of a move-in ready home for your family, your first property or a great investment, this home is a must-see. Presented in beautiful condition and offering four bedrooms, two bathrooms and an enviable cul-de-sac location, you'll be proud to call this place home. A spacious and open-plan kitchen, dining and living zone will be the centre of day-to-day life. The kitchen offers plenty of bench and storage space plus a large pantry, with stainless steel appliances and 900mm stove and oven. Outdoor living is also on offer thanks to the large covered entertaining area which overlooks the great-sized backyard. The separate formal lounge offers a quiet space to unwind while the study is great for those who work from home or for the kids to do homework. The three bedrooms all feature built-in robes and the master offers a large walk-in robe plus an ensuite. Enjoy a double garage with internal access plus plenty of off-street parking while the backyard access makes it perfect for storing your boat or caravan. Ducted heating throughout and split system cooling ensures year-round comfort.There are a host of local schools nearby as well as public transport links and parks, while Corio Village is just minutes away. With easy access to the Ring Road you can be heading to Melbourne or Waurn Ponds in no time.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A charming home in a perfect location.
Welcoming this neat three bedroom home proudly positioned on a large allotment of 597m2 (approx.) in one of the greatest developing suburbs. Ideal for first home buyers, renovators and investors alike this property has something everyone will enjoy.
The home comprises of three bedrooms (two with BIR's), generous lounge upon entry featuring two ceiling fans and completed with polish floorboards that flow throughout the home, a central bathroom with separate toilet, updated kitchen with gas cooking and plenty of cupboard space, second rumpus room towards the rear of the home and all being heated year round by the ducted heating system.
Once you step outside you are greeted by a paved undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining the family and a yard big enough for any growing family and secure off street parking is available with a single car garage. In a perfect location it is only a short drive to Corio Village, North Shore train station and the Western Ring road what more could you want. Don't miss this chance, call to inspect today.

Description:
Perfect First Home Or Investment Opportunity
Set on a generous 612m2 (approx) with a north facing backyard in this popular pocket of Corio sits this well maintained and exceptionally neat family home ready for the new owner to make their own. Perfectly positioned within walking distance to Corio Central Shopping Centre, the Community Park, Shell Club, quality schools and only moments form the M1 taking you to Melbourne in well under an hour.
Featuring an abundance of natural light and high ceilings throughout this family home is neat as a pin and is the first time offered for sale. Comprising of three well-proportioned bedrooms, the master with robe and split system for extra comfort, sharing an updated central bathroom with an oversize shower and bath. The roomy kitchen is adjoined by the dining space that opens up onto the large living area. Central heating, a gas wall furnace and a split system will keep you comfortable all year around.
Completing this great offering is low maintenance gardens, a single lock up garage with work shop, roller shutters on all windows offering added security, maintenance free weatherboard cladding, and roof insulation. Don't miss your opportunity to inspect this exceptional home today.

Description:
Neat, Tidy & Immaculately Looked After
Set amongst a community of great neighbours who all look out for each other is this fantastic investment or move in ready home. Just moments away from public transport, the ring road, local convenience stores, Corio Central Shopping Centre & Northern Bay Colleges, Wexford P-8 campus. Under an hour to Melbourne and 10-15 mins to Geelong's CBD, this location will make a great investment opportunity or potential to move in and make your own.
* 3 great sized bedrooms (2 with BIRs + ceiling fans)
* Central bathroom and spacious laundry with separate toilet
* Family kitchen with ample storage & brand new Miele dishwasher (900mm gas cooktop & elec wall oven/grill)
* Spacious lounge including ceiling fan
* Ducted heating throughout & split system A/C
* Security system
* Extra-large single lock up garage
* Large paved undercover entertaining area leading to the large backyard perfect for a keen gardener (or very low maintenance as is)
* Fantastic tenants currently paying $290 per week who have been very reliable and want to stay on (lease expires in March '19, so also ready to move into if desired)
* A 598sqm (approx.) block providing a spacious yard
This would make a fantastic investment opportunity or first home with plenty of scope for renovations to modernise and make it yours.
Insights: 26 Shepherdson Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Unbeatable Value – Act Swiftly!
10 Nevada Avenue provides exceptional value for money, proving to be a rock-solid investment prospect for investors, or can easily double up as a comfortable entry-level first home.
The home itself comprises:
•Light-filled spacious living area with large windows
•3 x well-proportioned bedrooms with timber floors
•Functional kitchen with gas cooking
•Centrally located bathroom with separate wc
•Expansive front and rear yards
•Single lock-up garage plus ample off-street parking
•Currently leased to a brilliant tenant
•Land size: 555m2 approx.
With easy access to all your major amenities, there arguably isn’t a more resourceful location in Geelong. The Corio Village Shopping Centre, Northern Bay College, easy public transport access, several medical facilities and direct highway access to Melbourne highlight the property’s ideal location.
Call Wilsons today for more information or to inspect.

Description:
Simplicity in a Quiet Street
Situated in a tranquil street close to Corio Central Shopping Mall and five schools, this Simonds home of approximately 3 years old stands out from the crowd. Surrounded by older houses, this eye-catching 3 bedroom brick veneer would ideally suit a first home buyer, downsizer or investor. The open plan living area makes communicating a breeze and enhances the fun time.
The notable inclusions simply make living here a joy!
• Retreat to your spacious Master Bedroom with walk-in robe, generous ensuite, and oversized shower,
• Relax with a movie in the entertainment area,
• The double car garage has ample room for additional storage,
• Create feasts in the magnificently formatted kitchen with five-burner gas stove and walk-in pantry,
• The low-maintenance yard will give you back your weekends.
Corio has undergone a huge shift in the past few years. Now viewed as a desirable suburb for the daily car or train commute to Melbourne, the area is being revitalised and serious investors are now taking notice, so act now.
Insights: 9B Detroit Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Great location & investment in Corio
Sitting on a generous allotment of 618sqm, Situated in a growth suburb of Corio this property is a must to inspect. This 3 bedroom home is waiting for the new owners to renovate or develop (STCA).
With a spacious, open plan kitchen, dining / living area with Gas heater and central bathroom, this little gem still has a lot of love to give.
Comprising of spacious front lounge room with solid hardwood floors, ceiling fan and gas heating system for all year round comfort. A neat functional &update kitchen with new built in oven and pantry and ample storage. There is also a separate dinning space seating up to 4 near the kitchen. Down the hall you will find 3 generous size bedrooms with brand new carpet throughout, two with BIR's, one room with plenty of ceiling storage space.
Outside you have a pergola area ideal for entertaining and a large rear yard perfect for children / pets. Other features include a large laundry with bench and cupboard and wood-garden shed and double garage, spacious parking space in the drive way.
Located within walking distance to schools, shops & public transport.
Only moments from the Corio Central Shopping Centre and minutes to the Geelong Ring Road for Melbourne and Surf Coast commuters and just around the corner from the Princes Highway.
Convenient location and full of potential, this property is definitely worth considering.
Insights: 9 Buangor Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
